name: DeleteResult

fields.name: errorMessage
fields.description: The error message thatâ€™s generated by a failed delete operation. Recorded with a result of type DataSource.DeleteResult.

fields.name: externalId
fields.description: The unique identifier of a row that represents an external object record to delete.

fields.name: success
fields.description: Indicates whether a delete operation succeeded or failed.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Maintains the integrity of lists of type DeleteResult by determining the equality of external objects in a list. This method is dynamic and is based on the equals method in Java.

params.name: obj
params.description: External object whose key is to be validated.

methods.name: failure
methods.signature: public static DataSource.DeleteResult failure(String externalId, String errorMessage)
methods.description: Creates a delete result indicating the failure of a delete request for a given external ID.

params.name: errorMessage
params.description: The unique identifier of the sObject record to delete. The reason the delete operation failed.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Maintains the integrity of lists of type DeleteResult by determining the uniqueness of the external object records in a list.

methods.name: success
methods.description: Creates a delete result indicating the successful completion of a delete request for a given external ID.

params.name: externalId
params.description: The unique identifier of the sObject record to delete.

description: Represents the result of a delete operation on an sObject record. The result is returned by the DataSource.deleteRows method of the DataSource.Connection class.
